options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

properties.name: toolDescription
properties.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

properties.description: Category of the attribute

properties.name: attributeName

properties.description: Attribute Type

properties.name: attributeValue
properties.description: Value of the attribute

options.name: categoryEnumeration

values.name: attributeCategoryValue
values.description: ID of the value, must be numeric

options.description: List of values and labels that the attribute can take

options.name: sort

options.name: modifiedSince
options.description: Filter (urlencoded) the contacts modified after a given UTC date-time (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ss.SSSZ)

options.name: Send Template
options.action: Send an email with an existing Template

properties.name: subject
properties.description: Subject of the email

properties.name: textContent
properties.description: Text content of the message

properties.name: htmlContent
properties.description: HTML content of the message

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: Additional fields to add

values.name: binaryPropertyName
values.description: The name of the incoming field containing the binary file data to be processed

options.name: emailTags
options.description: Add tags to your emails to find them more easily

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: Additional fields to add

values.name: binaryPropertyName
values.description: The name of the incoming field containing the binary file data to be processed

options.name: emailTags
options.description: Add tags to your emails to find them more easily

options.name: templateParameters
options.description: Pass a set of attributes to customize the template

values.name: batchSize
values.description: Input will be split in batches to throttle requests. -1 for disabled. 0 will be treated as 1.

values.name: batchInterval
values.description: Time (in milliseconds) between each batch of requests. 0 for disabled.

options.name: allowUnauthorizedCerts
options.description: Whether to accept the response even if SSL certificate validation is not possible

options.name: proxy
options.description: HTTP proxy to use. If authentication is required it can be defined as follow: http://username:password@myproxy:3128

options.name: timeout
options.description: Time in ms to wait for the server to send response headers (and start the response body) before aborting the request
